channel.title: Ruby on Octavio Lugo Camacho

item.title: Ruby
item.description: What is Ruby? Ruby is… A dynamic, open source programming language focused on simplicity and productivity. Its elegant syntax feels natural to read and easy to write. How to install Ruby with RVM? Install RVM Run the following commands on your production server to install RVM: $ sudo gpg --keyserver hkp://keys.gnupg.net --recv-keys 409B6B1796C275462A1703113804BB82D39DC0E3 $ curl -sSL https://get.rvm.io | sudo bash -s stable $ sudo usermod -a -G rvm `whoami` You may need to use gpg2 instead of gpg on some systems.
